item.title: London Startup Weekend starts in 2 days (insert panic now)
item.description: London Startup Weekend, the 54 weekend event for anyone into startups or running their own business starts this Friday.

item.title: London Startup Weekend June 4 - 6 tickets on sale
item.description: Damien Saunders is organising the next London Startup Weekend (http://london.startupweekend.org) @startuplondon which will take place June 4 – 5 - 6 2010 in just under a month at the IBM offices on London’s Southbank.
